message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I believe it's a game-changer for your business. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am currently working within a budget that restricts me to a maximum of $1000000. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $950000 for the product.

I appreciate your counteroffer, Bob, but I'm afraid I need to make a profit on this deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1100000.
I understand your position, Alice. Let's try to find a middle ground. I'm willing to increase my offer to $1050000 for the product.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. I'm getting closer to my minimum price, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1050000 is a bit too low for me, so I'll meet you in the middle again. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1075000.
Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I'm willing to pay $1062500 for the product.
